name: Dariusburst
description:
Darius Burst (ダライアスバースト) is a Shooter video game published by Taito Corporation released on December 24th, 2009 for the PlayStation Portable.
This is the final installment on Darius series of horizontal shooters. You once again assume the role of a Planet Darius member that must defend the planet against the Belser Army.
